context: <b4_0>Research institutes linked to <b6_0>the third level colleges<b4_0/> in the city<b6_0/> support <b7_0>the research and innovation capacity of the city and region<b7_0/>. Examples include the Tyndall National Institute (ICT hardware research), <a1_0>IMERC (Marine Energy)<a1_0/>, Environmental Research Institute, NIMBUS (Network Embedded Systems); and CREATE (Advanced Therapeutic Engineering). UCC and CIT also have start-up company incubation centres. In UCC, <a2_0>the IGNITE Graduate Business Innovation Centre<a2_0/> aims to foster and support <b10_0>entrepreneurship<b10_0/>.
